usage_rules.headings: Use Chivo for all H1-H6. Weight 900 for Hero, 700 for Section Headers. Tracking-tight.
usage_rules.body: Use Public Sans for all paragraphs and UI text. High legibility.

glassmorphism.overlay: bg-white/80 dark:bg-slate-900/80 backdrop-blur-xl border border-white/20 shadow-lg
glassmorphism.usage: Map floating panels, mobile navigation, toast notifications

sections.hero: col-span-full h-[80vh] flex items-center justify-center relative overflow-hidden
sections.feature_map: col-span-12 md:col-span-8 row-span-2 bg-slate-900 text-white p-8 rounded-3xl
sections.feature_community: col-span-6 md:col-span-4 bg-white border border-slate-200 p-8 rounded-3xl

app_interface.structure: Absolute positioning for UI elements over the map layer.

dashboard.card_style: bg-white dark:bg-slate-900 border border-slate-200 dark:border-slate-800 rounded-xl p-4

buttons.primary: rounded-full px-8 py-3 font-bold tracking-wide shadow-lg hover:shadow-indigo-500/25 transition-all hover:-translate-y-0.5
buttons.secondary: rounded-full px-6 py-3 border border-slate-200 hover:bg-slate-50 transition-colors
buttons.icon: rounded-full p-3 bg-white/90 backdrop-blur shadow-md hover:bg-white transition-colors

cards.feature: group relative overflow-hidden rounded-3xl border border-slate-200 bg-white p-8 transition-all hover:shadow-xl hover:border-indigo-500/50
cards.metric: rounded-xl border border-slate-100 bg-white p-6 shadow-sm

inputs.search: h-12 rounded-full border-slate-200 bg-white/90 backdrop-blur px-6 shadow-sm focus:ring-2 focus:ring-indigo-500

hero_bg.usage: Hero section background with heavy dark overlay

accessibility_rules.contrast: Ensure all text on map overlays has a bg-opacity of at least 90% or a backdrop-blur.
accessibility_rules.focus: All interactive elements must have visible focus rings (ring-2 ring-indigo-500).
accessibility_rules.aria: Map markers must have aria-labels describing the safety status.

instructions_to_main_agent: 1. INSTALL FONTS: Add the Google Fonts import to index.css immediately.
2. CONFIGURE TAILWIND: Update tailwind.config.js with the 'lumina' and 'safety' color extensions.
3. LANDING PAGE: Build the landing page using the Bento Grid layout. Use the 'hero_bg' image with a dark overlay.
4. MAP INTERFACE: Create a 'MapLayout' component. The map should be full screen. Controls (Search, Filter, Report) should be floating glass panels.
5. DASHBOARD: Use the 'High Density Grid' for the NGO/City dashboard. Use Recharts for data visualization.
6. COMPONENTS: Customize existing Shadcn components. Radius should be '0.75rem' (rounded-xl) generally, but '9999px' (rounded-full) for buttons.
7. THEME: Implement a ThemeProvider. Default to 'light' for Landing, but allow 'dark' toggle. Map might need a specific 'Night Mode' toggle independent of the app theme.
universal_guidelines: Ensure all buttons have micro-interactions (hover lift, scale).
